backend/main.mo: Defines audit event types, role and controller records, access control initialization, and core queries for app controller and initialization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level summaries of many frontend files including dashboards, panels, hooks, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables and theme-aware light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, role checks, dashboard routing, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown to unauthorized users with login prompts, principal copy tool, and ICP status panels.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays detailed audit log information including timestamps, action types, severity, and descriptions in a scrollable dialog.
Shows authentication state, principal ID, and backend connectivity status with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Provides UI to view and configure external security event broadcasting settings, including endpoint URL and enable/disable controls.
Implements a file-based code editor with category switching, unsaved-change handling, apply/reset actions, and file state persistence.
frontend/src/components/DashboardViewSwi: Renders buttons for switching between security and ICP operations dashboard views when allowed.
Displays instructions and links for deploying the app via the Caffeine platform with guidance and recommended steps.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with authentication controls, role-based titles, theme switching, and optional dashboard view switching.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network status, canister details, and connection health with retry and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Provides UI to grant or revoke ICP controller roles, manage principal inputs, and view existing controllers.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: Shows a searchable, categorized list of ICP controls with import/export, reset, and edit functionality.
Renders an individual ICP control row with appropriate input type based on control definition.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and introduces the ICP controls catalog with a link to the full configuration section.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: UI panel showing prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions for deploying canisters to the ICP mainnet. Includes alerts, badges, and code snippet examples.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a user's name and saves their profile using a mutation. Displays validation and loading states during submission.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Displays recent security alerts and flagged users with live updates filtered from audit logs. Shows alert counts, timestamps, and severity‑based styling.
frontend/src/components/RolesAccessPanel: Panel for viewing principals, checking app controller status, and initializing or copying role‑related identities. Handles loading, errors, and role‑based UI states.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Interactive terminal interface that executes registered commands with context from actor and identity, maintaining history and handling errors. Supports command execution, privilege checks, and scroll management.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Computes and displays security event statistics from audit logs, including critical events, failed logins, and spikes. Provides alerts and a summary card with recent activity metrics.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Provides superuser tools to export audit logs, export flagged users, and record audit actions with JSON download helpers.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: UI for manually creating test audit log entries with selectable action types and metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Manages user flagging, unflagging, and removal, displaying flagged users and validating principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/WebControlQuickT: Client-side tools for exporting, importing, and resetting configuration plus copying the current principal.
frontend/src/components/WorldWideWebCont: Lets admins grant or revoke World Wide Web Controller roles and view current controllers with principal validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Checks backend availability by calling a lightweight status method and exposes connectivity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardView.ts: Manages dashboard view selection based on auth state, access permissions, and sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Builds and manages ICP control configuration from URL, sessionStorage, and defaults, with setters and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading persisted identities and managing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for profiles, controller statuses, and related mutations.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Defines helpers for parsing, serializing, validating, and session-keying ICP control values.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Defines all ICP control categories and control metadata used by the configuration system.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Declares TypeScript types for control definitions, categories, options, and control metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard composed of security, audit, terminal, deployment, and management panels with live audit logs.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Displays an operations dashboard that adapts terminal commands and UI panels based on ICP or Web Controller role.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Provides shared React Query key generators for controller statuses, principals, and related lists.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the terminal command registry composed of core commands.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Defines core terminal commands including help, clear, and security role-management with audit logging and query invalidation.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Implements a restricted command set for ICP Controllers including help, clear, and profile management commands.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Provides audit helpers, error classification, auth checks, and utilities for timestamps and enum parsing.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for terminal commands, context, outputs, and history entries.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlAudit.ts: Wraps Web Control terminal commands with best‑effort audit logging and shared error handling utilities.
frontend/src/terminal/webControlCommandC: Generates large sets of read‑only diagnostic and operations command metadata for the Web Control terminal.
frontend/src/terminal/worldWideWebContro: Defines core terminal commands like help, clear, and status, integrating with the Web Control command catalog and audit system.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages file content persistence for the in-browser code editor using localStorage, including saving, applying, and resetting changes.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Provides helpers for determining ICP network defaults, validating canister IDs, and deriving labels and host URLs.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Handles exporting, downloading, importing, validating, and reading ICP Controls configuration JSON files.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, extended styles, and typography/container/animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON document describing the project’s state, planned features, architectural notes, issues, and existing feature metadata for a security‑enhanced ICP‑integrated app.
